TopicTitle: KSP just won't close when I press the quit.

Articles.Content:
When i press Quit all it does is freeze up the game, then i have to Alt+F4 evertime, got rid of all the mods and even did a fresh install and everything it still does just freeze up when i press quit.
Player.log
If Alt-F4 is working for you then there isn’t really a problem at all. Sometimes I have to end the process in Task Manager to get KSP to close.

So,

I have been having the same issue, but you don't need to wory actually. You see there is no problem with the KSP itself but it is probably the computer is not that good. So if you could send me the specs of your PC it would be amazing.

On 4/7/2023 at 6:37 PM, jimmymcgoochie said:

If Alt-F4 is working for you then there isn’t really a problem at all. Sometimes I have to end the process in Task Manager to get KSP to close.

yes but its not sometimes its evertime like ever evertime, even unmoded clean fresh installs :c

On 4/11/2023 at 4:50 PM, Some Kerbal out there said:

So,

I have been having the same issue, but you don't need to wory actually. You see there is no problem with the KSP itself but it is probably the computer is not that good. So if you could send me the specs of your PC it would be amazing.

Though the log file had them, but here they are
Ryzen 5600x
Nvidia 1650
16Gb 2x8 ddr4 4000mhz
Samsung nvme 980 Tb [Boot drive and the drive the game is installed on]

Edited April 20, 2023 by Vphurple Izumi
So i am taking it that there is just no fix?
Alt+F4 IS the fix; or failing that, end task in task manager.

On 5/16/2023 at 4:32 PM, jimmymcgoochie said:

Alt+F4 IS the fix; or failing that, end task in task manager. 

That is literally a work around not a fix, a fix would be that would make it so i can quit the game without having to risk my savedata

is it too much to ask for me to  quit the game , when i press the button that is ment to make me quit? wihtout having to crash the game evertime i wish to stop playing?  

Like really?

Edited May 19, 2023 by Vphurple Izumi
